input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Salesforce Oracle Integration

A financial entity is encountering difficulties with the Salesforce CRM and Oracle Database 19c integration, which is impeding data analytics due to possible software version incompatibilities My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. After confirming connections, updating software, and rebooting systems, the issue remains unresolved. Assistance is required to address this problem. You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.
